data.name: Hand Sentry
data.description: An expert martial artist who conceals his allies with smoke bombs.

starItems.name: Hand Sentry
starItems.description: An expert martial artist who conceals his allies with smoke bombs.

1.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self.

2.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self + apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> ally.

3.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self + apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> allies.

4.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self + apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> allies.

5.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> allies.

6.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> allies.

7.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies except self for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>4</color> allies. Gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
